Test Name: Cryoglobulin and Cryofibrinogen Panel, Serum and Plasma
Purpose: Detection and quantification of cryoglobulins and cryofibrinogen in patient samples.
Container: Pre-warmed red-top (no additive) tube for serum; pre-warmed blue-top sodium citrate tube for plasma
Equipment: 37 °C water bath/incubator, centrifuge capable of 37 °C, cryoglobulin/cryofibrinogen reagent kits, pipettes
